description.content: Mentoring new partners and maintaining a productive, positive team environment.
Supporting sales growth through upselling and strong visual merchandising.
Managing cash handling, inventory control, and online order fulfilment.
Leading shift operations; ensuring smooth workflow, team coordination, and high service standards.

companyTitle: Zhongqi Wangpan Technology Zhuhai Co., Ltd

description.content: Updated and managed website content using HTML/CSS/JavaScript, improving load times and UX.
Processed and formatted digital materials for web publishing, ensuring visual consistency and performance.
Contributed to the development of a WeChat Mini Program as an additional access channel alongside the company website.
Integrated basic WeChat APIs (e.g. Mini Program login and data interaction) to support user authentication and content delivery.
Collaborated with team members to implement content changes based on stakeholder feedback.
